00034 // Retrieves the data size of the next block
00035 Uint32 CSavedGame::getDataSize(std::ifstream &StateFile) {
00036  Uint32 size=0;
00037  for(Uint32 i=0 ; i<sizeof(Uint32) ; i++) {
00038   size += StateFile.get() << (i*8);
00039  }
00040  return size;
00041 }
00042 
00043 // Read the data of size and stores it in the buffer
00044 void CSavedGame::readData(char *buffer, Uint32 size, std::ifstream &StateFile) {
00045  for(Uint32 i=0 ; i<size ; i++) {
00046   buffer[i] = StateFile.get();
00047  }
00048 }

00050 // Used here for filtering the filetypes
00051 struct StateFileListFiller {
00052  std::set<std::string> list;
00053 
00054  bool operator() (const std::string& filename) {
00055   std::string ext = GetFileExtension(filename);
00056   if (stringcaseequal(ext, "ck1") ||
00057    stringcaseequal(ext, "ck2") ||
00058    stringcaseequal(ext, "ck3") )
00059    list.insert(filename);
00060 
00061   return true;
00062  }
00063 };
00064 // This method returns the the list of files we can use for the menu
00065 // It will filter by episode and sort the list by number of slot
00066 // It also takes care of the slotname resolution
00067 std::vector<std::string> CSavedGame::getSlotList()
00068 {
00069  std::vector<std::string> filelist;
00070  std::string buf;
00071 
00072  //Get the list of ".ck?" files
00073  StateFileListFiller sfilelist;
00074  FindFiles(sfilelist, m_savedir, false, FM_REG);
00075 
00076  std::set<std::string>::iterator i;
00077  for( i=sfilelist.list.begin() ; i!=sfilelist.list.end() ; i++ )
00078  {
00079   buf = i->substr(i->size()-1);
00080 
00081   // Check if the file fits to this episode
00082   if(atoi(buf) == m_Episode)
00083   {
00084    Uint32 pos = getSlotNumber(*i)-1;
00085    buf = getSlotName(*i);
00086 
00087    if(pos+1 > filelist.size())
00088     filelist.resize(pos+1, "");
00089 
00090    filelist.at(pos) = buf;
00091   }
00092  }
00093 
00094  return filelist;
00095 }

00099 bool CSavedGame::IsOldSGVersion5(const std::string& fname)
00100 {
00101  const char *verify = "CKSAVE";
00102  FILE* fp = OpenGameFile(fname, "rb");
00103  if (!fp) return false;
00104 
00105  for(size_t i=0; i < strlen(verify); i++)
00106  {
00107   char c = fgetc(fp);
00108   if (c != verify[i])
00109   {
00110    fclose(fp);
00111    return false;
00112   }
00113   printf("%c", c);
00114  }
00115  if (fgetc(fp) != OLDSAVEGAMEVERSION5)
00116  {
00117   fclose(fp);
00118   return false;
00119  }
00120  fclose(fp);
00121  return true;
00122 }
00123 
00124 bool CSavedGame::IsOldSGVersion4(const std::string& fname)
00125 {
00126  FILE* fp = OpenGameFile(fname, "rb");
00127  if (!fp) return false;
00128 
00129  if (fgetc(fp) != 'S') { fclose(fp); return false; }
00130  if (fgetc(fp) != OLDSAVEGAMEVERSION4) { fclose(fp); return false; }
00131 
00132  fclose(fp);
00133  return true;
00134 }
00135 
00136 /**
00137  * This to find the proper old save game version
00138  */
00139 int CSavedGame::getOldSGVersion(const std::string& fname)
00140 {
00141  if(IsOldSGVersion5(fname))
00142   return 5;
00143  if(IsOldSGVersion4(fname))
00144   return 4;
00145  else
00146   return 0;
00147 }

00149 // This function converts savegame all files from old versions of CG to the new format
00150 void CSavedGame::convertAllOldFormats()
00151 {
00152  for(size_t slot=0 ; slot<=9 ; slot++ )
00153   convertOldFormat(slot);
00154 }

00156 /**
00157  * This function loads the savegame of the 5th version
00158  */
00159 bool CSavedGame::loadSaveGameVersion5(const std::string &fname, OldSaveGameFormatV5& old)
00160 {
00161  FILE *fp;
00162  unsigned char episode, level, lives, numplayers;
00163 
00164  g_pLogFile->ftextOut("Loading game from file %s\n", fname.c_str());
00165  fp = OpenGameFile(fname, "rb");
00166  if (!fp) { g_pLogFile->ftextOut("unable to open %s\n",fname.c_str()); return false; }
00167 
00168  readOldHeader(fp, &episode, &level, &lives, &numplayers);
00169 
00170  g_pLogFile->ftextOut("game_load: restoring structures...\n");
00171  /*primaryplayer =*/ fgetc(fp); // primary player doesn't exist anymore! Jump that!
00172 
00173  sgrle_compress(fp, (unsigned char *) &old.LevelControl, sizeof(old.LevelControl));
00174 
00175  // note that we don't have to load the LEVEL, because the state
00176  // of the map is already saved inside the save-game.
00177  sgrle_initdecompression();
00178  if (sgrle_decompressV2(fp, (unsigned char *) &old.LevelControl, sizeof(old.LevelControl))) return false;
00179 
00180  if (sgrle_decompressV2(fp, (unsigned char *)&old.scroll_x, sizeof(old.scroll_x))) return false;
00181  if (sgrle_decompressV2(fp, (unsigned char *)&old.scrollx_buf, sizeof(old.scrollx_buf))) return false;
00182  if (sgrle_decompressV2(fp, (unsigned char *)&old.scrollpix, sizeof(old.scrollpix))) return false;
00183  if (sgrle_decompressV2(fp, (unsigned char *)&old.mapx, sizeof(old.mapx))) return false;
00184  if (sgrle_decompressV2(fp, (unsigned char *)&old.mapxstripepos, sizeof(old.mapxstripepos))) return false;
00185 
00186  if (sgrle_decompressV2(fp, (unsigned char *)&old.scroll_y, sizeof(old.scroll_y))) return false;
00187  if (sgrle_decompressV2(fp, (unsigned char *)&old.scrolly_buf, sizeof(old.scrolly_buf))) return false;
00188  if (sgrle_decompressV2(fp, (unsigned char *)&old.scrollpixy, sizeof(old.scrollpixy))) return false;
00189  if (sgrle_decompressV2(fp, (unsigned char *)&old.mapy, sizeof(old.mapy))) return false;
00190  if (sgrle_decompressV2(fp, (unsigned char *)&old.mapystripepos, sizeof(old.mapystripepos))) return false;
00191 
00192  if (sgrle_decompressV2(fp, (unsigned char *)&old.max_scroll_x, sizeof(old.max_scroll_x))) return false;
00193  if (sgrle_decompressV2(fp, (unsigned char *)&old.max_scroll_y, sizeof(old.max_scroll_y))) return false;
00194 
00195  if (sgrle_decompressV2(fp, (unsigned char *)&old.map, sizeof(old.map))) return false;
00196 
00197  unsigned char *tempbuf;
00198 
00199  tempbuf = new unsigned char[22624];
00200 
00201  /*highest_objslot = */fgetc(fp); fgetc(fp); // Not used anymore since objects are held in an vector.
00202  if (sgrle_decompressV2(fp, (unsigned char *)tempbuf, 22624)) return false;
00203  if (sgrle_decompressV2(fp, (unsigned char *)tempbuf, 9612)) return false;
00204 
00205  delete [] tempbuf;
00206 
00207  if (sgrle_decompressV2(fp, (unsigned char *)&old.Player, sizeof(old.Player))) return false;
00208 
00209  fclose(fp);
00210 
00211  return true;
00212 }

00214 bool CSavedGame::loadSaveGameVersion4(const std::string &fname, OldSaveGameFormatV4& old)
00215 {
00216  FILE *fp;
00217  //unsigned char episode, level, lives;
00218  unsigned int numplayers;
00219 
00220  g_pLogFile->ftextOut("Loading game from file %s\n", fname.c_str());
00221  fp = OpenGameFile(fname, "rb");
00222  if (!fp) { g_pLogFile->ftextOut("unable to open %s\n",fname.c_str()); return false; }
00223 
00224  g_pLogFile->ftextOut("game_load: restoring structures...\n");
00225  if (fgetc(fp) != 'S') { fclose(fp); return false; }
00226  if (fgetc(fp) != OLDSAVEGAMEVERSION4) { fclose(fp); return false; }
00227  fgetc(fp);
00228 
00229  // load all structures from the file
00230  sgrle_initdecompression();
00231  sgrle_decompressV1(fp, (unsigned char *)&numplayers, sizeof(numplayers));
00232  sgrle_decompressV1(fp, (unsigned char *)&old.LevelControl, sizeof(old.LevelControl));
00233  sgrle_decompressV1(fp, (unsigned char *)&old.scroll_x, sizeof(old.scroll_x));
00234  sgrle_decompressV1(fp, (unsigned char *)&old.scroll_y, sizeof(old.scroll_y));
00235  sgrle_decompressV1(fp, (unsigned char *)&old.max_scroll_x, sizeof(old.max_scroll_x));
00236  sgrle_decompressV1(fp, (unsigned char *)&old.max_scroll_y, sizeof(old.max_scroll_y));
00237  sgrle_decompressV1(fp, (unsigned char *)&old.map, sizeof(old.map));
00238 
00239  //initgame( &(pCKP->Control.levelcontrol) ); // reset scroll
00240  //drawmap();
00241  //for(i=0;i<scrx;i++) map_scroll_right();
00242  //for(i=0;i<scry;i++) map_scroll_down();
00243 
00244  sgrle_decompressV1(fp, (unsigned char *)&old.Player, sizeof(old.Player));
00245 
00246  //sgrle_decompress(fp, (unsigned char *)&objects[0], sizeof(objects));
00247  //sgrle_decompress(fp, (unsigned char *)&tiles[0], sizeof(tiles));
00248 
00249  fclose(fp);
00250 
00251  return true;
00252 }
00253 
00254 // Converts one old savegame file to the new format...
00255 bool CSavedGame::convertOldFormat(size_t slot)
00256 {
00257  // TODO: Old CG 0.3.0.4 Code Handle with care
00258  std::string fname;
00259  int version;
00260 
00261  fname = "ep";
00262  fname += itoa(m_Episode);
00263  fname += "save";
00264  fname += itoa(slot);
00265  fname += ".dat";
00266 
00267  if ( ((version = getOldSGVersion(fname)) == 0) )
00268   return false;
00269 
00270  size_t newslot = slot;
00271  while(Fileexists(newslot))
00272   newslot++;
00273 
00274  prepareSaveGame(newslot, "oldsave"+itoa(slot));
00275 
00276  if(alreadyExits())
00277  {
00278   g_pLogFile->textOut("You already have \""+m_statefilename+"\". If you want to export an old savegame erase it, or erase the old savegame if it's already exported!" );
00279   return false;
00280  }
00281 
00282  if(version == 5)
00283  {
00284   OldSaveGameFormatV5 old;
00285 
00286   if(!loadSaveGameVersion5(fname, old)) return false;
00287 
00288   // Rename the old save game to the extension bak, so it won't be converted again
00289   std::string newfname = fname.substr(0,fname.size()-3) + "bak";
00290   Rename(fname, newfname);
00291 
00292   //
00293   // Now let's save it into a new format
00294   //
00295   /// Save the Game in the CSavedGame object
00296   // store the episode, level and difficulty
00297   encodeData(old.LevelControl.episode);
00298   encodeData(old.LevelControl.curlevel);
00299   encodeData(old.LevelControl.hardmode ? 2 : 1);
00300 
00301   // Also the last checkpoint is stored. This is the level entered from map
00302   // in Commander Keen games
00303   encodeData(false); // No checkpoint set
00304   encodeData(0); // Checkpoint X set to zero
00305   encodeData(0); // Checkpoint Y set to zero
00306   encodeData(old.LevelControl.dark);
00307 
00308   // Save number of Players
00309   encodeData(1);
00310 
00311   // Now save the inventory of every player
00312   encodeData(old.Player.x);
00313   encodeData(old.Player.y);
00314   encodeData(old.Player.blockedd);
00315   encodeData(old.Player.blockedu);
00316   encodeData(old.Player.blockedl);
00317   encodeData(old.Player.blockedr);
00318   encodeData(old.Player.inventory);
00319 
00320   // save the number of objects on screen.
00321   encodeData(0);
00322 
00323   // Save the map_data as it is left
00324   encodeData(old.map.xsize);
00325   encodeData(old.map.ysize);
00326 
00327   word *mapdata = new word[old.map.xsize*old.map.ysize];
00328   for( size_t x=0 ; x<old.map.xsize ; x++ )
00329   {
00330    for( size_t y=0 ; y<old.map.ysize ; y++ )
00331    {
00332     mapdata[y*old.map.xsize+x] = old.map.mapdata[x][y];
00333    }
00334   }
00335   addData( (byte*)(mapdata), 2*old.map.xsize*old.map.ysize );
00336 
00337   delete [] mapdata;
00338 
00339   // store completed levels
00340   addData( (byte*)(old.LevelControl.levels_completed), MAX_LEVELS_VORTICON );
00341 
00342   g_pLogFile->ftextOut("Structures restored: map size: %d,%d and saved\n", old.map.xsize, old.map.ysize);
00343  }
00344  else if(version == 4)
00345  {
00346   OldSaveGameFormatV4 old;
00347 
00348   if(!loadSaveGameVersion4(fname, old)) return false;
00349 
00350   // Rename the old save game to the extension bak, so it won't be converted again
00351   std::string newfname = fname.substr(0,fname.size()-3) + "bak";
00352   Rename(fname, newfname);
00353 
00354   //
00355   // Now let's save it into a new format
00356   //
00357   /// Save the Game in the CSavedGame object
00358   // store the episode, level and difficulty
00359   encodeData(old.LevelControl.episode);
00360   encodeData(old.LevelControl.curlevel);
00361   encodeData(old.LevelControl.hardmode ? 2 : 1);
00362 
00363   // Also the last checkpoint is stored. This is the level entered from map
00364   // in Commander Keen games
00365   encodeData(false); // No checkpoint set
00366   encodeData(0); // Checkpoint X set to zero
00367   encodeData(0); // Checkpoint Y set to zero
00368   encodeData(old.LevelControl.dark);
00369 
00370   // Save number of Players
00371   encodeData(1);
00372 
00373   // Now save the inventory of every player
00374   encodeData(old.Player.x);
00375   encodeData(old.Player.y);
00376   encodeData(old.Player.blockedd);
00377   encodeData(old.Player.blockedu);
00378   encodeData(old.Player.blockedl);
00379   encodeData(old.Player.blockedr);
00380   encodeData(old.Player.inventory);
00381 
00382   // save the number of objects on screen.
00383   encodeData(0);
00384 
00385   // Save the map_data as it is left
00386   encodeData(old.map.xsize);
00387   encodeData(old.map.ysize);
00388 
00389   word *mapdata = new word[old.map.xsize*old.map.ysize];
00390   for( size_t x=0 ; x<old.map.xsize ; x++ )
00391   {
00392    for( size_t y=0 ; y<old.map.ysize ; y++ )
00393    {
00394     mapdata[y*old.map.xsize+x] = old.map.mapdata[x][y];
00395    }
00396   }
00397   addData( (byte*)(mapdata), 2*old.map.xsize*old.map.ysize );
00398 
00399   delete [] mapdata;
00400 
00401   // store completed levels
00402   addData( (byte*)(old.LevelControl.levels_completed), MAX_LEVELS_VORTICON );
00403 
00404   g_pLogFile->ftextOut("Structures restored: map size: %d,%d and saved\n", old.map.xsize, old.map.ysize);
00405  }
00406  else
00407  {
00408   g_pLogFile->ftextOut("Sorry, but the old save game format is unknown\n");
00409   return false;
00410  }
00411 
00412  save();
00413 
00414  g_pLogFile->ftextOut("The old savegame has been converted successfully OK\n");
00415 
00416  return true;
00417 }

00420 // this is seperated out of game_load for modularity because menumanager.c
00421 // also uses it, in it's save-game "preview" menu on the load game screen
00422 void CSavedGame::readOldHeader(FILE *fp, byte *episode, byte *level, byte *lives, byte *num_players)
00423 {
00424  fseek(fp, SG_HEADERSIZE, SEEK_SET);  // skip past the CKSAVE%c
00425  *episode = fgetc(fp);
00426  *level = fgetc(fp);
00427  *lives = fgetc(fp);
00428  *num_players = fgetc(fp);
00429 }

00433 // From judging the filename it tells you at what position this slot was saved!
00434 Uint32 CSavedGame::getSlotNumber(const std::string &filename)
00435 {
00436  int pos = filename.find("cksave") + strlen("cksave");
00437  std::string buf = filename.substr(pos);
00438  buf = buf.substr(0, buf.size()-sizeof(".ck"));
00439 
00440  return atoi(buf);
00441 }
00442 
00443 // This method returns the name of the slot
00444 std::string CSavedGame::getSlotName(const std::string &filename)
00445 {
00446  char version;
00447  std::ifstream StateFile;
00448  std::string SlotName;
00449  OpenGameFileR( StateFile, filename, std::ofstream::binary );
00450 
00451  // Check Savegame version
00452  version = StateFile.get();
00453 
00454  if(version != SAVEGAMEVERSION)
00455  {
00456   SlotName = "- File Incompatible -";
00457  }
00458  else
00459  {
00460   // read the slot name
00461   Uint32 size = StateFile.get();
00462   std::vector<char> buf(size + 1);
00463   readData( &buf[0], size, StateFile);
00464   buf[size] = '\0';
00465   SlotName = &buf[0];
00466  }
00467 
00468  StateFile.close();
00469 
00470  return SlotName;
00471 }

00473 /**
00474  * \brief checks if the file of the chosen slot exits
00475  * \param SaveSlot  Slot where to check for the file
00476  * \return true if it exists, else false
00477  */
00478 bool CSavedGame::Fileexists( int SaveSlot )
00479 {
00480  std::string filename = m_savedir + "/cksave"+itoa(SaveSlot)+".ck"+itoa(m_Episode);
00481  return IsFileAvailable(filename);
00482 }
00483 
00484 // This method is called by the menu. It assures that the
00485 // PlayGame instance will call save() and get the right data.
00486 bool CSavedGame::prepareSaveGame( int SaveSlot, const std::string &Name)
00487 {
00488  m_statefilename =  m_savedir + "/cksave"+itoa(SaveSlot)+".ck"+itoa(m_Episode);
00489  m_statename = Name;
00490  m_datablock.clear();
00491 
00492  // This will make the CPlayGame instance call save
00493  m_Command = SAVE;
00494 
00495  m_offset = 0;
00496 
00497  return true;
00498 }
00499 
00500 // This method is called by the menu. It assures that the
00501 // PlayGame instance will call load() and get the right data.
00502 bool CSavedGame::prepareLoadGame(int SaveSlot)
00503 {
00504  m_statefilename = m_savedir + "/cksave"+itoa(SaveSlot)+".ck"+itoa(m_Episode);
00505     m_datablock.clear();
00506 
00507  // This will make the CPlayGame instance call save
00508  m_Command = LOAD;
00509 
00510  return true;
00511 }
00512 
00513 bool CSavedGame::load()
00514 {
00515  Uint32 size;
00516  std::ifstream StateFile;
00517  std::string fullpath = GetFullFileName(m_statefilename);
00518  OpenGameFileR( StateFile, m_statefilename, std::ofstream::binary );
00519 
00520     if (!StateFile.is_open()) {
00521      g_pLogFile->textOut("Error loading \"" + fullpath + "\". Please check the status of that file.\n" );
00522      return false;
00523     }
00524 
00525     // Skip the header as we already chose the game
00526     StateFile.get(); // Skip the version info
00527     size = StateFile.get(); // get the size of the slotname and...
00528     for(Uint32 i=0 ; i<size ; i++) // skip that name string
00529      StateFile.get();
00530 
00531     while(!StateFile.eof()) // read it everything in
00532      m_datablock.push_back(StateFile.get());
00533 
00534  // TODO: Decompression has still to be done!
00535 
00536  // Now write all the data to the file
00537  StateFile.close();
00538 
00539  // Done!
00540  g_pLogFile->textOut("File \""+ fullpath +"\" was sucessfully loaded. Size: "+itoa(m_datablock.size())+"\n");
00541  m_Command = NONE;
00542  m_offset = 0;
00543  m_statefilename.clear();
00544  m_statename.clear();
00545 
00546  return true;
00547 }
00548 
00549 // This function checks if the file we want to read or save already exists
00550 bool CSavedGame::alreadyExits()
00551 {
00552  std::ifstream StateFile;
00553  std::string fullpath = GetFullFileName(m_statefilename);
00554  OpenGameFileR( StateFile, m_statefilename, std::ofstream::binary );
00555 
00556     if (!StateFile.is_open())
00557      return false;
00558     else
00559     {
00560      StateFile.close();
00561      return true;
00562     }
00563 }
00564 
00565 // This function writes all the data from the CPlayGame and CMenu Instances to a file,
00566 // closes it and flushes the data block.
00567 bool CSavedGame::save()
00568 {
00569  std::ofstream StateFile;
00570  std::string fullpath = GetFullFileName(m_statefilename);
00571  bool open = OpenGameFileW( StateFile, m_statefilename, std::ofstream::binary );
00572 
00573     if (!open) {
00574      g_pLogFile->textOut("Error saving \"" + fullpath + "\". Please check the status of that path.\n" );
00575      m_Command = NONE;
00576      return false;
00577     }
00578 
00579  // Convert everything to a primitive data structure
00580  // First pass the header, which is only version,
00581  // sizeofname and name of slot itself
00582  Uint32 offset = 0;
00583  Uint32 size = sizeof(SAVEGAMEVERSION)
00584     + sizeof(char)
00585     + m_statename.size()*sizeof(char);
00586 
00587  size += m_datablock.size();
00588  // Headersize + Datablock size
00589  std::vector<char> primitive_buffer(size);
00590 
00591  // Write the header
00592  primitive_buffer[offset++] = SAVEGAMEVERSION;
00593  primitive_buffer[offset++] = m_statename.size();
00594 
00595  for( Uint32 i=0; i<m_statename.size() ; i++ ){
00596   primitive_buffer[offset++] = m_statename[i];
00597  }
00598 
00599  // Write the collected data block
00600  std::vector<byte>::iterator pos = m_datablock.begin();
00601  for( size_t i=0; i<m_datablock.size() ; i++ ){
00602   primitive_buffer[offset++] = *pos;
00603   pos++;
00604  }
00605 
00606  // TODO: Compression has still to be done!
00607 
00608  // Now write all the data to the file
00609     StateFile.write( &primitive_buffer[0], size );
00610  StateFile.close();
00611 
00612  m_datablock.clear();
00613 
00614  // Done!
00615  g_pLogFile->textOut("File \""+ fullpath +"\" was sucessfully saved. Size: "+itoa(size)+"\n");
00616  m_Command = NONE;
00617  m_statefilename.clear();
00618  m_statename.clear();
00619 
00620  return true;
00621 }
00622 
00623 // Adds data of size to the main data block
00624 void CSavedGame::addData(byte *data, Uint32 size) {
00625  for(Uint32 i=0 ; i<sizeof(Uint32) ; i++ )
00626  {
00627   Uint32 datasize;
00628   datasize = size&( 0xFF<<(i*8) );
00629   datasize >>= (i*8);
00630   m_datablock.push_back( static_cast<byte>(datasize) );
00631  }
00632  for(Uint32 i=0 ; i<size ; i++ )
00633   m_datablock.push_back(data[i]);
00634 }
00635 
00636 // Read data of size from the main data block
00637 void CSavedGame::readDataBlock(byte *data) {
00638  Uint32 datasize=0;
00639  memcpy(&datasize, &m_datablock[m_offset], sizeof(Uint32));
00640  m_offset += sizeof(Uint32);
00641 
00642  memcpy(data, &m_datablock[m_offset], datasize);
00643  m_offset += datasize;
00644 }

00647  // TODO Auto-generated destructor stub
00648 }
